content: german translation added april 11th 2010 thanks to thayet 1 simple but clever market bag use any dk weight yarn you want cotton linen and hemp are perfect **send your plastic bags to be recycled ** *where it says has been corrected in v2 continue increasing in the established pattern every 2nd round till you have 32 42 st on each of the 3 needles= 96 126 total it should be continue increasing in the established pattern every 2nd round till you have 32 44 st on each of the 3 needles= 96 132 total* 1 http //www ravelry com/people/thayet
